column3: Total No. of Cases for Investigation Including Pending Cases (Col.3)
column5: No. of Cases in which Investigation was Refused (Col.5)
column6: No. of Cases in which Investigation was Completed - Charge Found False / Mistake of Fact or Law Etc. (Col.6)
column7: No. of Cases in which Investigation was Completed - Final Report True Submitted (Col.7)
column8: No. of Cases in which Investigation was Completed - ChargeSheets were Submitted (Col.8)
column9: No. of Cases in which Investigation was Completed - Total (Col.9) = Col.{(6) + (7) + (8)}

column2: Protection of Civil Rights Act - Total
Protection of Civil Rights Act - (i) PCR Act for SCs
Protection of Civil Rights Act - (ii) PCR Act for STs
SC/ST (prevention of Atrocities) Act - (i) Attrocities Act for SCs
